hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals the #Royal Family's Tomb#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #chests past Dark Link# in the Water Temple hold...^ #a Bottom of the Well Small Key# and #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to #King Dodongo#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Huge Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Heart Container# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Strength Upgrade# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #cow behind webs# in a grotto gifts #a Fish Bottle#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #a Deku Stick# can be found in #the Market#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Lobby Right Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #Bombs (20 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Shadow Temple Small Key# and #Bombchus (20 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #4# major items.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #1# major item.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #deep in the wasteland# is #the Megaton Hammer#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #the Iron Boots#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Right Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

ZF (Jabu).text: Did you know that Barinade is allergic to bananas?

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Heavy Block First Chest

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides a #Great Fairy Fountain#.
